TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HideDisabledControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 提供關聯之 Web 控制項的呈現功能，以修改特定瀏覽器的預設標記或行為。

span.span: Provides rendering capabilities for the associated Web control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會適應相關聯控制項來修改預設標記或特定瀏覽器的行為。The class adapts the associated control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser. 您可以延伸類別，以進一步自訂轉譯控制項。You can extend the class to further customize rendering of the control. 配接器是已編譯接管生命週期的頁面或控制項中的一個或多個階段的.NET Framework 元件。Adapters are compiled .NET Framework components that take over one or more stages in the life cycle of a page or control. 擴充類別會提供存取權的生命週期階段控制項。Extending the class will provide access to the life-cycle stages of the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)). 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework，才能搜尋控制項要求的瀏覽器的特性對應配置器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 瀏覽器定義檔案由找出用戶端瀏覽器的特性，並對應至瀏覽器類型的配接器的類別。Browser definition files are used by the class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)). 如需調整呈現的架構 ASP.NET 和逐步解說，示範如何實作控制項配接器，並將它對應至控制項的說明，請參閱 「 撰寫 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項配接器：簡介"MSDN library [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For a description of the adaptive rendering architecture of ASP.NET and a step-by-step walkthrough that shows how to implement a control adapter and map it to a control, see "Authoring ASP.NET Server Control Adapters: An Introduction" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別，以顯示中啟用和停用狀態的控制項。The following code example shows how to extend the class to display a control in an enabled and disabled state. 這個範例包含三個部分：This example contains three parts: - 配接器會衍生自類別。An adapter derived from the class. - .Aspx 檔案，其中包含控制項和裝置特定內容。The .aspx file that incorporates the control and device-specific content. - 要連結的裝置類型的配接器的瀏覽器檔案。A browser file to link the adapter to a device type. 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告與裝置特定內容的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control with device-specific content. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/implcs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/implvb.aspx#3)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何連結Windows CE.NET 上執行的瀏覽器的自訂配接器的控制項。The following code example shows how to link the control to the custom adapter for browsers running on Windows CE .NET.

related.span: 調整控制項行為的架構概觀

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 建構的執行個體類別。The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the class. 配接器的初始要求會導致.NET Framework，才能搜尋控制項要求的瀏覽器的特性對應配置器。The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser. 找到後，控制項保留在對應的配接器執行個體的參考其屬性。Once found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its property. 如需配接器對應和瀏覽器定義檔案的資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100))。For information on adapter mappings and browser definition files, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/67276kc5(v=vs.100)).

related.span: 調整控制項行為的架構概觀

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含組建及呈現特定裝置輸出方法的 。

span.span: The containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.

summary.span: 將關聯的 Web 控制項當成 HTML 寫入至輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes the associated Web control to the output stream as HTML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會寫入相關聯以 html 格式輸出資料流的控制項。The method writes the associated control to the output stream as HTML. 根據預設，.NET Framework 呼叫上 Web 伺服器控制項的自己方法。By default, the .NET Framework calls on the Web server control's own method. 不過，一旦屬性，該控制項的設定時，.NET Framework 將會執行的配接器的實作關聯控制項的事件。However, once the property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will execute the adapter's implementation of the event over that of the associated control. 事件用來執行的裝置瀏覽器呈現的標記程式碼的修改。The event is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser. 在這個階段的生命週期和實際的標記建立控制項的做法之前，應該設定控制項屬性。Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle and only the actual markup creation for the control done here. 在這個階段的生命週期，來控制所做的變更不會儲存檢視狀態。Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state. 儲存控制項所做的變更，覆寫事件。For saving changes made to the control, override the event. 事件也可讓衍生的類別，以處理事件，但不附加委派，它是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用的技巧。The event also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以傳遞呈現如果啟用相關聯的控制項的父控制項的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to pass the object to the parent control for rendering if the associated control is enabled. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/CS/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter/VB/hidedisabledcontrolcontosoadapter.vb#2)]
